name: It's Too? Two? To? Much! Quiz | Quiz Creation Guidelines | 10 Questions

questions.text: Quizzes with ___ many errors will be rejected.
questions.explanation:
too.

	'Too' refers to quantity- too much, too many, too soon. It is also used to mean 'also.'

questions.text: ___________ are far too many quizzes about the Simpsons and the Backstreet Boys!
questions.explanation:
There.

	'Their' is possessive. 'They're' is a contraction for 'they are.'

None of these.

	The correct word would be 'Who's', short for 'Who is.'

questions.text: If you are going _____ write a quiz, make sure not to make ________ many errors!
_______ aren't many quizmakers who send in ________ quizzes with no errors 100 percent of the time. ___________ just not common!
__________ the person ________ quizzes are so well-written?
questions.explanation:
None of these.

	The correct answer is 'Who's, whose'.

questions.text: ____ too bad that many quizzes have grammar and spelling errors, and ______ the responsibility of the quizmaker to make sure that these errors are corrected.
questions.explanation:
It's it's.

	For more fun with this particular topic, try the quiz 'It's Its!' in this section.

questions.text: Quizmakers? _______ work is vital; without them _______ would not be a Quizzyland!
questions.explanation:
None of these.

	It should be 'Their, there'

questions.text: If spelling is ________ difficult for you, ask some other quizmakers for __________ opinions.
I hope you learned something from this quiz. If you did, it served ______ purpose, and ________ will be no errors in _______ next quiz!
